flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: 태양 에너지에서 영양을 만들어낸다.n기온이 높은 낮에는 활발하게 움직이고n태양이 지면 뚝 하니 움직이지 않게 된다.
It converts sun­nlight into energy.nIn the darknessfafter sunset, itncloses its petalsnand becomes still.
In the daytime, itnrushes about in anhectic manner, butfit comes to a com­nplete stop whennthe sun sets.
As the hot seasonnapproaches, thenpetals on thisfPOKéMON's facenbecome more vividnand lively.
SUNFLORA converts solar energy intonnutrition. It moves around actively innthe daytime when it is warm.fIt stops moving as soon as the sun goesndown for the night.
SUNFLORA converts solar energy intonnutrition. It moves around actively innthe daytime when it is warm.fIt stops moving as soon as the sun goesndown for the night.
SUNFLORA convert solar energy intonnutrition. They are highly active in thenwarm daytime but suddenly stop moving asnsoon as the sun sets.
In the daytime, it rushes about in anhectic manner, but it comes to a completenstop when the sun sets.
It converts sunlight into energy. In thendarkness after sunset, it closes its petalsnand becomes still.
It gets energy from warm sunlightnand is known for its habit ofnmoving in pursuit of it.

It converts sunlight into energy.nIn the darkness after sunset, itncloses its petals and becomes still.
In the daytime, it rushes about in anhectic manner, but it comes to ancomplete stop when the sun sets.
Les rayons du soleil lui donnent denl’énergie. Il est connu pour migrernvers les régions ensoleillées.

Since it converts sunlightninto energy, it is always lookingnin the direction of the sun.

あつい　きせつが　ちかづくとnかおの　はなびらは　あざやかになりnかっぱつに　うごくようになる。
더운 계절이 다가오면n얼굴의 꽃잎이 선명해지고n활발하게 움직이게 된다.
À l’approche des beaux jours, les pétales entourantnsa tête deviennent plus chatoyants.
Steht der Sommer bevor, werden die Blätter umndas Gesicht dieses Pokémon aktiv und lebhaft.
A medida que se acerca el verano, va adquiriendo unncolor más vivo e intenso en los pétalos de la cara.
Con l’avvicinarsi della bella stagione, i suoi petali sinfanno più vivi e splendenti.
As the hot season approaches, the petals on thisnPokémon’s face become more vivid and lively.
暑い　季節が　近づくとn顔の　花びらは　鮮やかになりn活発に　動くようになる。
あたたかい　ひざしが　エネルギー。nたいようを　おいかけて　いどうするnしゅうせいで　しられている。
따뜻한 햇살이 에너지다.n태양을 쫓아 이동하는n습성으로 알려져 있다.
Les rayons du soleil lui donnent de l’énergie. Il estnconnu pour migrer vers les régions ensoleillées.
Warmes Sonnenlicht gibt ihm Energie. Daher wandertnes stets dem Sonnenlicht hinterher.
Obtiene energía de la luz solar. Este Pokémon esnfamoso por su heliotropismo.
Trae energia dalla luce del sole e si muove di continuonper cercare di assorbirne sempre di più.
It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known fornits habit of moving in pursuit of it.
暖かい　日差しが　エネルギー。n太陽を　追いかけて　移動するn習性で　知られている。
たいようエネルギーから　えいようを　つくりだす。nきおんの　たかい　にっちゅう　かっぱつに　うごきnたいようが　しずむと　ぱったり　うごかなくなる。
태양 에너지에서 영양을 만들어낸다.n기온이 높은 낮에는 활발하게 움직이고n태양이 지면 뚝 하니 움직이지 않게 된다.
Héliatronc convertit l’énergie solaire en nutriments. Il remuenactivement pendant la journée, quand il fait chaud. Il redevientnimmobile dès que le soleil se couche.
Sonnflora verwandelt Solarenergie in Nährstoffe. Tagsüber,nwenn es warm ist, ist es sehr aktiv. Wenn aber die Sonnenuntergegangen ist, hört es auf, sich zu bewegen.
Sunflora transforma la energía solar en nutrientes. De día,ncuando hace calor, está en continuo movimiento. Solo parancuando comienza a anochecer.
Sunflora converte l’energia solare in nutrimento. È attivondurante il giorno quando fa caldo. Tuttavia, appena il solentramonta non fa più il minimo movimento.
Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves aroundnactively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving asnsoon as the sun goes down for the night.
太陽エネルギーから　栄養を　つくりだす。n気温の　高い　日中　活発に　動きn太陽が　沈むと　ぱったり　動かなくなる。
